thorwin.math

Interface ComplexVector


  • public interface ComplexVector
    Complex vector.

      • random

        static ComplexVector random(int size,
                            int seed)
        Creates a random complex vector. This vector is filled with pseudo-random values.
        Parameters:
        size - size of the vector
        seed - random seed
        Returns:
        the random vector

      • fft

        static ComplexVector fft(double... reals)
        Performs a Fast Fourier Transformation on the input samples.
        Parameters:
        reals - real input samples (length should be a order of two)
        Returns:
        Fourier transformed result

        Pads the values with complex zero values.
        Parameters:

        Returns:

      • equals

        default boolean equals(ComplexVector other,
                       double epsilon)
        Compares this complex vector with another. This method has limited mathematical applicability.
        Parameters:
        other - the other complex vector
        epsilon - maximum difference in real or imaginary value
        Returns:
        true if both vectors are approximately equal
